### FindAvailableVals() {#a3d50f3f3bb104fb854ac8de326c5bb64}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename UpdaterT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>void llvm::SSAUpdaterImpl&lt; UpdaterT &gt;::FindAvailableVals (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">BlockListTy</a> &#42; BlockList)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
FindAvailableVal - If this block requires a PHI, first check if an existing PHI matches the PHI placement and reaching definitions computed earlier, and if not, create a new PHI.

Visit all the block&#39;s predecessors to calculate the available value for each one and fill in the incoming values for a new PHI.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/ssaupdaterimpl-h/#l00353">353</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/ssaupdaterimpl-h">SSAUpdaterImpl.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### FindDominators() {#a0ab1c1435c29eea38d7a8dd64f064b84}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename UpdaterT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>void llvm::SSAUpdaterImpl&lt; UpdaterT &gt;::FindDominators (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">BlockListTy</a> &#42; BlockList, BBInfo &#42; PseudoEntry)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
FindDominators - Calculate the dominator tree for the subset of the CFG corresponding to the basic blocks on the BlockList.

This uses the algorithm from: &quot;A Simple, Fast Dominance Algorithm&quot; by Cooper, Harvey and Kennedy, published in Softwareâ€“Practice and Experience, 2001, 4:1-10. Because the CFG subset does not include any edges leading into blocks that define the value, the results are not the usual dominator tree. The CFG subset has a single pseudo-entry node with edges to a set of root nodes for blocks that define the value. The dominators for this subset CFG are not the standard dominators but they are adequate for placing PHIs within the subset CFG.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/ssaupdaterimpl-h/#l00240">240</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/ssaupdaterimpl-h">SSAUpdaterImpl.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  labels = {["inline"]}>
FindExistingPHI - Look through the PHI nodes in a block to see if any of them match what is needed.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/ssaupdaterimpl-h/#l00415">415</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/ssaupdaterimpl-h">SSAUpdaterImpl.h</a>.

### FindPHIPlacement() {#aad5016c6fea77df1d3f4af224e1472db}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename UpdaterT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>void llvm::SSAUpdaterImpl&lt; UpdaterT &gt;::FindPHIPlacement (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">BlockListTy</a> &#42; BlockList)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
FindPHIPlacement - PHIs are needed in the iterated dominance frontiers of the known definitions.

Iteratively add PHIs in the dom frontiers until nothing changes. Along the way, keep track of the nearest dominating definitions for non-PHI blocks.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/ssaupdaterimpl-h/#l00294">294</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/ssaupdaterimpl-h">SSAUpdaterImpl.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  labels = {["inline"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> all predecessors and if all of them have the same AvailableVal use it as value for block represented by Info.

Return true if singluar value is found.

### GetValue() {#a4f6c8ac18caa1b4beaf0d4d88b82cef9}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename UpdaterT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>ValT llvm::SSAUpdaterImpl&lt; UpdaterT &gt;::GetValue (BlkT &#42; BB)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
GetValue - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> to see if AvailableVals has an entry for the specified BB and if so, return it.

If not, construct SSA form by first calculating the required placement of PHIs and then inserting new PHIs where needed.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/ssaupdaterimpl-h/#l00094">94</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/ssaupdaterimpl-h">SSAUpdaterImpl.h</a>.

### IntersectDominators() {#ad25fe079e293e33582cbb5f3bf494bf5}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename UpdaterT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>BBInfo &#42; llvm::SSAUpdaterImpl&lt; UpdaterT &gt;::IntersectDominators (BBInfo &#42; Blk1, BBInfo &#42; Blk2)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
IntersectDominators - This is the dataflow lattice &quot;meet&quot; operation for finding dominators.

Given two basic blocks, it walks up the dominator tree until it finds a common dominator of both. It uses the postorder number of the blocks to determine how to do that.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/ssaupdaterimpl-h/#l00214">214</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/ssaupdaterimpl-h">SSAUpdaterImpl.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### IsDefInDomFrontier() {#a42e6b449c6b8fe1fa8d10f2f300f7e9b}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename UpdaterT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>bool llvm::SSAUpdaterImpl&lt; UpdaterT &gt;::IsDefInDomFrontier (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> BBInfo &#42; Pred, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> BBInfo &#42; IDom)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
IsDefInDomFrontier - Search up the dominator tree from Pred to IDom for any blocks containing definitions of the value.

If one is found, then the successor of Pred is in the dominance frontier for the definition, and this function returns true.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/ssaupdaterimpl-h/#l00282">282</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/ssaupdaterimpl-h">SSAUpdaterImpl.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
